mapper.select: SELECT tt.id, tt.created_id createdId, date_format(tt.view_date,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') viewDate, case tt.schedule_id WHEN 0 THEN tt.view_target else tt.`name` end viewTarget, tt.file_key fileKey, tt.file_length fileLength, tt.bucket_name bucketName, tt.file_name fileName, tt.view_notes viewNotes, dct1.dict_value interviewResultId, dct1.dict_code interviewResultCode, dct1.`name` interviewResult, dct2.dict_value resultReasonId, dct2.dict_code resultReasonCode, dct2.`name` resultReason, tt.reason_other reasonOther FROM( SELECT r.id, r.created_id, r.view_date, con.name, r.view_target, sf.file_key, sf.file_length, sf.bucket_name, sf.file_name, r.view_notes, r.schedule_id, r.interview_result, case WHEN locate('Veto',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingVetoReason' WHEN locate('Undetermined',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingUndeterminedReason' WHEN locate('Following',r.result_reason)>0 THEN 'meetingFollowingReason' else '' end resultReason, r.result_reason, r.reason_other FROM sop_interview_record r left join sop_file sf on sf.id=r.file_id left join schedule_contacts con on r.view_target=con.id WHERE r.id=#{id} and r.interview_valid = 0 and sf.file_valid=1)tt LEFT JOIN dict dct1 ON dct1.parent_code='meetingResult' and dct1.dict_code=tt.interview_result LEFT JOIN dict dct2 ON dct2.parent_code=tt.resultReason and dct2.dict_code=tt.result_reason;
